item.title: Azure DevTest Labs powered builds for Dynamics 365 FinOps
item.author: maxnguyen
item.description: This post has been written thanks to Joris de Gruyter‘s session in the past DynamicsCon: Azure Devops Automation for Finance and Operations Like You’ve Never Seen! And there’s also been some investigation and (a lot of) trial-and-error from my side until everything has been working. Azure DevTest Labs powered builds for Dynamics 365 FnO 1 Configuring the build VM in Azure DevTest Labs If you want to know more about builds, releases, and the Dev ALM of Dynamics 365 you can read my full guide on MSDyn365 & Azure DevOps ALM.
